attributes.action: To recognise Captain Tom Moore for his magnificent achievement
attributes.additional_details: To recognise his magnificent achievement in raising millions of pounds for the NHS
attributes.background: To name the next new Hospital built in the U.K. after Captain Tom Moore

rejection.details:
The naming of hospitals or individual wards is a matter for NHS England and individual NHS trusts, and not the Government or Parliament. 

You can read the NHS's identity guidelines here: https://www.england.nhs.uk/nhsidentity/identity-guidelines/naming-principles/
